item.description:
Yoga to Embody the Sacred

4 Wednesday mornings,  9:00-10:15, February 2, 9, 16, 23
You will gain--
♥ Peace through Meditation
♥ Body opening with hatha yoga postures
♥ Mindfulness with slow motion movement
♥ High vibration from powerful sacred music
♥ Energy clearing with Crystal and Tibetan singing bowls

Bring a yoga mat, blanket and water

All levels are welcome. Class is limited to 8. Fee: $50
Registration and full payment required prior to start of class: call Judy at 781-639-1236 or email.
Judy is a certified professional level Kripalu Yoga teacher.  See more offerings at www.AHigherBalance.com

A Higher Balance Healing Center
201 Washington St., Suite 6B
Salem MA
781-639-1236
item.why: This is gentle yoga with sacred music, sound healing instruments, meditation. Come slow down, relax and open the body, mind, heart and soul.
item.name: Yoga to Embody the Sacred
